Package Sprite

Class AnimatedSprite

java.lang.Object
Sprite.StaticSprite
Sprite.AnimatedSprite
public class AnimatedSprite
extends StaticSprite
Class extends sprite, provides methods for animating.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AnimatedSprite​(double x, double y, double z, double height, double width, int columns, int rows, java.lang.String file)
    Creates animated sprite from large image consisting of evenly spaced frames.
    AnimatedSprite​(double x, double y, double z, int columns, int rows, java.lang.String file)
    Creates animated sprite from large image consisting of evenly spaced frames.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void animate​(boolean loop)
    Starts animation in new TimeLine, which updates sprite every millisecond specified.

    boolean hasFinished()

    Changes sprite to next in animation
    void setAnimFrames​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> columns, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> rows)
    Sets sequence of played frames.
    void setDuration​(double duration)
    Sets period in milliseconds of animation.
    void stopAnim()
    Stops currently playing animation.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimatedSprite

      public AnimatedSprite​(double x, double y, double z, double height, double width, int columns, int rows, java.lang.String file) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates animated sprite from large image consisting of evenly spaced frames.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of sprite.
      y - y coordinate of sprite.
      z - z coordinate of sprite.
      height - height of sprite.
      width - width of sprite.
      columns - how many sprites are in each row.
      rows - how many sprites are in each column.
      file - string representing path of image.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if height or columns are below 1.

    • AnimatedSprite

      public AnimatedSprite​(double x, double y, double z, int columns, int rows, java.lang.String file) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates animated sprite from large image consisting of evenly spaced frames.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of sprite.
      y - y coordinate of sprite.
      z - z coordinate of sprite.
      columns - how many sprites are in each row.
      rows - how many sprites are in each column.
      file - string representing path of image.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if height or columns are below 1.

  • Method Details

    • getFrame

      public int getFrame()
      Returns:
      currently played frame.

    • setAnimFrames

      public void setAnimFrames​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> columns, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> rows)
      Sets sequence of played frames.
      Parameters:
      columns - columns of frames to be played in order.
      rows - rows of frames to be played in order.

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration​(double duration)
      Sets period in milliseconds of animation.
      Parameters:
      duration - milliseconds.

    • nextFrame

      public boolean nextFrame​(boolean loop)
      Changes sprite to next in animation
      Parameters:
      loop - whether the animation starts over after last frame.
      Returns:
      whether the frame was switched successfully.

    • animate

      public void animate​(boolean loop)
      Starts animation in new TimeLine, which updates sprite every millisecond specified.
      Parameters:
      loop - whether the animation starts over after last frame.

    • hasFinished

      public boolean hasFinished()
      Returns:
      whether last frame was played.

    • stopAnim

      public void stopAnim()
      Stops currently playing animation.
